A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: this \"franchise\" can be burried now.  similar to what Alien Covenant was for the Alien \"franchise\" this movie destroys all characters and character development from the old movies\, brings in purple haired SJW´s in space and is a blatant spit in the face of anyone just loving the original series. I cant believe i´m saying this but the prequels look like artworks now. at least they didnt killed of Star Wars. Avoid. at. all. cost. Ah yes the music and vistas were great. But same was true for Alien Covenant or any other high budget movie nowdays.
